item.description:
OK everyone, the train is pulling up to the station, grab your dancing shoes, your chickens and let's go dancing.  ALL ABOARD!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

 

Don't Call Me Shirley is playing at the Tap, hopefully weather permitting on the deck.  If not on the deck we will be upstairs in the club.

 

We will meet an hour before the band goes on so if anyone wants to grab some munchies from the kitchen or to sit and chat for awhile.

 

So come on and join us out on that dance floor!!!!!!!!

You might even be able to see someone's house from there :)

 

Remember, if you get lost, can't find us or are running late, please call the Meetup Cell phone at 978-304-2811.

 

Hope to see you all at the Tap

Donna & Janet
item.name: Don't Call Me Shirley @ The Tap
